general.gigTitle: do custom website development as a full stack website developer, website builder

sellerCard.oneLiner: Crafting Scalable Web Solutions I FullStack Developer I React I NodeJS
sellerCard.description:
Greetings! I'm a Computer Engineer and a full-time freelancer working as a Full-stack Web Developer on Fiverr.

I specialize in designing and developing functional custom websites tailored to your unique needs, delivering exceptional performance and an outstanding user experience. Whether you need a business website, personal blog, eCommerce store, or any other website design, I've got you covered. 

So, are you ready to make your mark in the digital world? Let's talk and bring your ideas to life!

Best regards,
Nadiatul Sakib

description.content:
Hey buddy, thanks for visiting my Full Stack Website Development Gig!


I'm Nadiatul Sakib, a Senior full stack developer passionate about crafting digital experiences that don't just work they wow.


Imagine this: A website that loads in the blink of an eye, looks stunning on every device, and leaves your visitors thinking, "Wow, I need this!" That's exactly what I deliver.


From the first line of code to the final click, I pour my creativity and expertise into every project to ensure it's not just functional but unforgettable.


What I Offer:


  • Custom Website Development
  • Full Stack Website (Frontend + Backend) Development
  • Responsive Design Across all Devices
  • API Integration
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • SEO Optimization
  • Bug Fixing, Maintenance and Updates


Technologies I Use:


  1. Frontend: Next.js, JavaScript, React, Vue.js
  2. Backend: Node.js, Express.js, PHP, Laravel
  3. Databases: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL


Why Choose Me?


  • 100% Client Satisfaction with on-time delivery
  • Clean, Scalable and Maintainable Code
  • Dedicated Post-Launch Support


So, what are you waiting for? Contact me now for a free consultation or get a quote! Your dream website is just a click away!

slide.name: do custom website development as a full stack website developer, website builder

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your experience in Website development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I've worked as a full-stack web developer for the past five years.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Full Stack Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Full-stack development involves developing both the frontend (client-side) and backend (server-side) of a web application. It covers everything from creating the user interface to administering the server and database.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use for Full Stack Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Depending on the project's requirements, I employ a range of technologies. Typically, the frontend technologies include React.js or Next.js, while the backend uses Node.js and Express.js. The database is managed using MongoDB.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What services are included in this gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: - UI/UX design - Frontend development - Backend development - Database integration - API development and integration - Testing and debugging - Deployment and maintenance

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be compatible with mobile devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all of the websites I create are fully responsive and mobile-friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert Figma to React?
Do you offer any assistance after the site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide 30-day free assistance; however, you can contact me after one month. I am always available to help you with your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be allowed to make future changes to the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you may easily change your website in the future, and I will also guide you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to complete a Full Stack Development project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeline for a project varies based on the complexity and requirements. Generally, a basic project might take 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects could take several months.

packageList.title: Starter Spark
packageList.description: Develop Static Custom or CMS Website Following Client Design (No API Integration) + Responsive

packageList.title: Business Boost - Website
packageList.description: Attractive 5 Pages Functional Website + Custom Design + Responsive + API Development Over Discussion

packageList.title: Enterprise Power - Website
packageList.description: 10 Pages Advance Custom Website + Responsive + eCommerce Functionality + API Integration + Basic SEO

reviews.comment: Sakib is done on a website project. Sakib created a nicely designed website for our company, and he was cooperative, honest and willing to help and implement our feedback at any moment. Thanks for your patience. Hopefully, we will work together again!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the outstanding review! It has been great working with you and I hope to work with you again in the future.

reviews.comment:
Outstanding Experience!

I had an exceptional experience working with this web designer. He exceeded my expectations in every way! The communication was crystal clear throughout the project, and he was always quick to respond to my messages. His polite and professional demeanor made the collaboration smooth and enjoyable. The final design was exactly what my client envisioned. I highly recommend his services and will definitely be returning for future projects. Thank you for the fantastic work! 🙌

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the outstanding review! It has been great working with you and I hope to work with you again in the future.

reviews.comment: Sakib is a very talented developer, who understands the job quickly and provides excellent results. I would highly recommend him to anyone needing work done.

seller_response.comment: A pleasure to work with you. Thank you so much :)

reviews.comment: Excellent seller to work with has great communication and is a hard-working person. Sakib was quick and communicated work, and I will choose him again for future work to be done.

seller_response.comment: Great communication with the buyer! Cool experience.

reviews.comment: Sakib completed the task quickly and efficiently to a very high standard. He was very creative, took on and implemented very quickly, and was easy to communicate with. Overall Sakib was an excellent
